content: this little dungeon monster is approximately 5 5 inches tall including leg length and 4 inches wide he sits on the edge of your shelf and waits for beginner adventurers to come by i would say this pattern is advanced beginner level however if you re a beginner and you ve made some amigurumi before you may be able to level up your skills by making this guy what makes the pattern more advanced than basic amigurumi is working in front loops and back loops using the invisible decrease invisible fasten_off method and embroidering the spots on the mushroom cap
